00069 /* IOCTL code for Sdmmc Module */

00071 /* Command code for disk_ioctrl fucntion */
00072 
00073 /* Generic command (defined for FatFs) */
00075 #define SDMMC002_CTRL_SYNC               0 
00076 
00078 #define SDMMC002_GET_SECTOR_COUNT        1 
00079 
00081 #define SDMMC002_GET_SECTOR_SIZE         2 
00082 
00084 #define SDMMC002_GET_BLOCK_SIZE          3 
00085 
00087 #define SDMMC002_CTRL_ERASE_SECTOR       4 
00088 
00089 /* Generic command */
00091 #define SDMMC002_CTRL_POWER              5 
00092 
00094 #define SDMMC002_CTRL_LOCK               6 
00095 
00097 #define SDMMC002_CTRL_EJECT              7 
00098 
00099 /* MMC/SDC specific ioctl command */
00100 
00102 #define SDMMC002_MMC_GET_TYPE            10 
00103 
00105 #define SDMMC002_MMC_GET_CSD             11 
00106 
00108 #define SDMMC002_MMC_GET_CID             12 
00109 
00111 #define SDMMC002_MMC_GET_OCR             13  
00112 
00114 #define SDMMC002_MMC_GET_SDSTAT          14  
00115 
00116 /* NAND specific ioctl command */
00118 #define SDMMC002_NAND_FORMAT             30  
00119 
00122 #define  SDMMC002_MMC_LOCK_CARD    (SDMMC002_NAND_FORMAT + 1 )
00123 
00126 #define  SDMMC002_MMC_UNLOCK_CARD (SDMMC002_MMC_LOCK_CARD + 1)
00127 
00130 #define  SDMMC002_MMC_SET_PASSWD (SDMMC002_MMC_UNLOCK_CARD + 1)
00131 
00134 #define  SDMMC002_MMC_CLEAR_PASSWD (SDMMC002_MMC_SET_PASSWD + 1)
00135 
00138 #define  SDMMC002_MMC_SET_LOCK    (SDMMC002_MMC_CLEAR_PASSWD + 1)
00139 
00142 #define  SDMMC002_MMC_READ_LOCK_STATUS  (SDMMC002_MMC_SET_LOCK + 1)
00143 
00146 #define  SDMMC002_MMC_FORCE_ERASE   (SDMMC002_MMC_READ_LOCK_STATUS + 1)

00157

00180 {

00187   */
00188   /*
00189   ERRCODESTRING = SDMMC002_ERROR
00190   STRCODESTRING = Error in SDMMC002 App.
00191   */

00196   /*
00197   GROUPID  #20
00198   MODULENAME = SDMMC Block Layer App
00199   */
00200   /*

00203   */
00204   SDMMC002_SDMMC00x_ERROR,
00205   
00209   /*
00210   GROUPID  #20
00211   MODULENAME = SDMMC Block Layer App
00212   */
00213   /*
00214   ERRCODESTRING = SDMMC002_DISK_LOCKED
00215   STRCODESTRING = SDMMC Device is locked.
00216   */
00217   SDMMC002_DISK_LOCKED,
00224   /*
00225   ERRCODESTRING = SDMMC002_FUNCTION_ENTRY
00226   STRCODESTRING = Function Entered %s
00227   */
00228     SDMMC002_FUNCTION_ENTRY,
00232   /*
00233   ERRCODESTRING = SDMMC002_FUNCTION_EXIT
00234   STRCODESTRING = Function Exited %s
00235   */
00236     SDMMC002_FUNCTION_EXIT
00237 } SDMMC002_ErrorCodesType;
